Text: Hi, I don't find subtitles for this one, nor french neither english. Is there any one who have links for good subs, thanks you :)

If you haven't found them already, here are both English and French subs...
http://subscene.com/La-Dolce-Vita/subtitles-25148.aspx
Completely useless!!! I've spent over half an hour trying to find english subtitles and none work!!! The above link is useless, none of those subtitles are in sync. Ridiculous.

Hey! c'mon you guys, just learn some Italian and enjoy. It is worth. Search for a torrent called pimsleur Italian I,II, and III. In three months you will be able to understand this almost all what they talk in the movie. Bye!
